meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one hundredth of a meter.
meanings.sent1: The ruler showed the length in centimeters.
meanings.sent2: She measured the bookshelf in centimeters.
meanings.sent3: The centimeters on the ruler had a race to see who was the longest.
meanings.sent4: His patience was as short as a centimeter.
meanings.sent5: The baby's tiny hand was just a few centimeters long.

meanings.definition: A measurement used to express the size of something in centimeters.
meanings.sent1: The tailor took her measurements in centimeters.
meanings.sent2: The height of the tree was recorded in centimeters.
meanings.sent3: The centimeters on the measuring tape whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her smile stretched for centimeters, showing her joy.
meanings.sent5: The distance between the two points was just a few centimeters.
